name: Night&Scape
description:
Description

A rumor is spreading across the globe : more and more people are plunged into a deep coma, while they were sleeping peacefully. There are no age, no gender, no regional criteria. However, it seems that the disease is carried from person to person. In a few days, there would have been a hundred victims : couples, friends, families..."

It's in these strange circumstances that our protagonists meet. They are the new Prison of Dreams's residents. Having just discovered the schemes of the Lord of Nightmares, and unable to intervene directly, the Dream Fairy awakens the dreamers's powers and provides them with objects and allies. They will have to thwart the Lord of Nightmares, free the others Dreamers and escape the Prison to get out of their lethargy.

Game mechanics

The game is a cooperative game with 4 participants, where players win and lose together. It takes the shape of a board with tiles on which allies and ennemies move. These tiles are initially hiddent, until they are revealed by a player, which will trigger its effects, positive or not...

As for now, 4 characters are available in the game. Differents boards and bosses, as well as new characters and objects, will be added as the game develops.
